content: ssk k2tog 4 times 14 sts remain next round ssk k2tog 2 times sl 1 k2tog psso 2 times 6 sts remain cut yarn and pull through remaining sts secure tail inside brim after several tries i decided to go with a brim inspired by that one on the cabled newsboy cap by shannita williams-alleyne in stitch & bitch nation shannita thanks for designing that kick-butt brim i love it pu 14 sts along center front of hat encompassing the two center cables you ll be working back and forth in row now row 1 ws purl across row 2 k2 m1r pm k10 pm m1l k2 pu and knit 2 sts from hat co edge row 3 p to end pu 2 sts from hat co edge row 4 k to marker m1r pm k10 pm m1l k to end pu and knit 2 sts from hat co edge row 5 repeat row 3 repeat row 4 & 5 until a total of 44 sts are on your needle ending with rs facing copyright © rosi garmendia 2008 all rights reserved for private non-commercial use only so don t go run off and make and sell 1000 of these www rosi-g com/soapyknitter 3 next row rs purl across next row bobble 2 sts purl to end next row bobble 2 sts knit to 2 sts before marker ssk sm k10 sm k2tog knit to end repeat last two row until 14 sts remain bobble stitch open edge closed on bottom of brim strip co 5 sts row 1 knit across row 2 k1 kf&b k1 kf&b k1 7 sts row 3 repeat row 1 row 4 k2 p3 k2 row 5 buttonhole k2 k2tog yo k3 row 6 repeat row 4 repeat row 3 & 4 for a total of 30 more row next row repeat row 5 next row repeat row 4 next row k1 ssk k1 k2tog k1 next row k2 p1 k2 bobble all sts in knit finishing weave in all ends sew buttons to cap as shown in picture with strip across the bottom of the cables do not sew down the strip block lightly if you wish wear proudly walk tall and don t forget to say sí capitán copyright © rosi garmendia 2008 all rights reserved for private non-commercial use only so don t go run off and make and sell 1000 of these www rosi-g com/soapyknitter
